transcript:
Customer: Hello\n
Customer: Hello\n
Customer: Hello\n
Customer: Hanji hello.\n
Executive: Hanji sir good good afternoon sir Dipesh baat kar raha hu.\n
Customer: Ji bataiye Dipesh sir.\n
Executive: Are mai bol raha tha maine aapko wo kuch document bataye the wo aapne fir bheje nahi mere ko.\n
Customer: Kya?\n
Executive: Maine kuch document aapko bheje the.\n
Customer: Bhejne ke liye mere paas wo aapne bheje nahi sir. Kya kya bhejna hai?\n
Executive: Whatsapp kiya tha sir maine aapko ek baar mai dobara bata deta hu.\n
Customer: Bataiye bataiye.\n
Executive: Kaha ho? Verify to bahut time ho gaya na isko verify hue hue sahab. Time do do teen mahine ke baad me verify hua kya ye?\n
Executive: But ye dobara mang rahe hai to fir de dete hai na kya dikkat hai aapke paas to hoga hi photo khich ke bhej dena mere ko.\n
Customer: Check karna padega na kya kya chahiye aapko.\n
Executive: Maine whatsapp kiya hai dekhiye 9759929496 wale number pe.\n
Customer: Achha. Nahi dobara kis liye mang rahe hai verify karne ke liye?\n
Executive: Dobara?\n
Customer: Ha ek baar to maine de rakha hai total sab chiz de diye. Aadhar card bhi de diya aap. Pan card bhi de diya usko.\n
Executive: Nahi nahi isme aisa kya hai ki.\n
Customer: Kya?\n
Executive: Kuch document miss ho gaye honge ya to shayad dobara KYC kar rahe honge. Ab isme itni details to nahi aati isme bas mere me likh ke aaya hai ki aapko mail aaya tha aapke client hai Anit ji karke aur ye unse document karwane KYC ke regarding chahiye ye likh ke aata hai bas.\n
Customer: Achha.\n
Executive: Ha. Aur isme aur us din aapse baat hui thi meri aur aapne whatsapp pe mere ko not satisfy de diya hai.\n
Customer: Are yaar wo jaldi jaldi me ho gaya.\n
Executive: Wahi to maine mere se kare yaar maine koi dikkat nahi hai.\n
Customer: Aap ek kaam karo wo jo complaint thi ₹2000 wali kya hua uska?\n
Executive: Us complaint ke regarding aapke paas call nahi aa raha kya?\n
Customer: Are wo pata nahi banda kaha hai kaun hai mere paas uska maal bhi pada hai yaar usse mere nikalne hai lakh rupaye kam se kam.\n
Executive: Hmm.\n
Customer: Wo complaint daal ke saala number hi na mil gaya mujhe na uska hath. Number yaad aa rahi hai maine khud bejiyan hu ki mai isse call pe baat karu.\n
Executive: Hmm.\n
Customer: Pata nahi kaha hai kya number hai. Nahi lekin tumhare paas complaint complaint wale jo matlab jo hamari complaint wali team hai uski taraf se call nahi aa rahi bilkul bhi?\n
Customer: Na na koi complaint nahi aa rahi. Koi call bhi nahi aa rahi.\n
Executive: Clear rehne do.\n
Customer: Kuch aa hi nahi raha na buylead sahi aa rahi hai na koi call aa raha hai.\n
Customer: Koi pata nahi kaise chal raha hai IndiaMART kuch samajh me nahi aa raha hai hamare to lekin ek ladka roj utha raha hai hamara.\n
Executive: Kya chiz utha raha hai?\n
Customer: Koi inquiry bhi roj utha raha permanent.\n
Executive: Ha.\n
Customer: Lekin koi response hi nahi hai.\n
Executive: Achha jo buylead utha rahe hai uske baad koi response nahi aa raha?\n
Customer: Koi order hi nahi kiya isme abhi tak ek order kiya tha uska maal pada hai. Usse ₹2000 ka advance aaya tha uske baki payment ko bola to usne hamare company pe complaint daal diya ₹2000 ka.\n
Executive: Ha wo to.\n
Executive: But us complaint ke regarding to aapko call aa rahi hogi.\n
Customer: Ek call bhi nahi aa rahi mai to khud bejiyan hu ki us buyer ka mujhe number mile aur mai baat karu usse.\n
Executive: Hmm.\n
Customer: Ab mere paas number hota to mai call kar leta abhi.\n
Executive: Ek minute fir mai karwata hu isme agar kuch ho jayega to.\n
Customer: Ab thodi ye catalog catalog wagera to sahi kar dijiye aap.\n
Executive: Are mai us din aapse baat hui thi to aapne bola thik hai mai jaake karta hu fir connect hi nahi ho paye. Bataiye kab free hote hai mai to kar dunga aaj kar lete hai.\n
Customer: Aaj mai thoda mai written call kar raha hu 10-15 minute me. Gaadi chala raha tha abhi.\n
Executive: Ha gaadi chala raha tha. Free hoke kar lenge hai na. Achha ek number ek number mere ko mil to raha hai yaha pe.\n
Executive: Ye number kiska hai aapka 7355418324 nahi ye aapka nahi hai na? Inko aapne kal call kiya tha kya?\n
Customer: Nahi nahi maine to call nahi kiya.\n
Executive: Is number se aapke paas call aayi thi? Kal aayi hai aapke paas sorry 11 tarikh ko aayi hai 10 baje ke kareeb.\n
Customer: Kaun se number se?\n
Executive: 7355418324.\n
Customer: Ye kaha ka number hai?\n
Executive: Ye hai mere hisab se Krishnchandra Yadav.\n
Executive: Ek kaam kijiye mai in in numbero pe mai try kar leta hu khud hi fir mai aapko ek baar bata du aap tab tak free hoke call karna to video call pe baith ke isko bhi sambhal lenge.\n
Executive: Aur kuch chize hai wo bhi discuss kar lenge thik hai.\n
Executive: Hello.\n
[No transcript available]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received a call regarding complaint.

- Customer wants buyer's number to discuss payment.

- No proper buyleads, orders, or calls received.

- Catalog needs to be corrected.



Resolution:

- Executive will try the numbers and inform customer.

- Executive offered to fix the catalog via video call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, buyleads, catalog, kyc, verification
